speak up.translation[0].definitions[0].d: used to ask someone to speak louder
speak up.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to say something, especially to express your opinion
speak up.translation[0].definitions[1].e: There was a brief silence, then Gerald spoke up.
speak up.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to speak in support of someone
speak up.translation[0].definitions[2].e: He is willing to speak up for the rights of women.
